sentences.english: All you have accomplished, honourable teacher, for my backward daughter!
sentences.chinese: 尊敬的老師，小女淺陋無知，承蒙您教誨。

sentences.english: And they wasn't meager, but had deep affection and rich contents. Why?
sentences.chinese: 但並非淺陋，而是有着深沉的感情與充實的內容。

sentences.english: A little learning is a dangerous thing .
Little learning is a dangerous thing.
sentences.chinese: 學識淺陋是一件危險的事。

sentences.english: Author bold mean, plans to make a preliminary discussion in light of this, asks respectfully to point out mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 筆者不揣淺陋，擬就此作一初步探討，敬請指正。

sentences.english: A lot of people have a rather shallow view of the plan of salvation.
sentences.chinese: 很多人對於救贖計劃僅有很淺陋的認識。
